content: _A unique identifier assigned to each sample. This ID should be distinct for every individual sample collected, ensuring precise tracking and reference._

_The name of the overarching research project during which the sample was collected. This should reflect the main initiative or study under which the sampling activity falls._

name: Starting point
Ending point

content: _These fields specify the exact date and time, in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), when the net throw was conducted._
_These fields specify the exact date and time, in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), when the net throw was conducted._

_These fields specify the geographic coordinates where the net throw was conducted in degrees, minutes, and seconds (DMS) format. The DMS format provides a traditional representation of geographic coordinates. Click [here](http://127.0.0.1:1880/dashboard/settings) to change the format._

_These fields specify the geographic coordinates where the net throw was conducted in decimal degrees (DD) format. Decimal degrees provide a straightforward numerical representation of the location. Click [here](http://127.0.0.1:1880/dashboard/settings) to change the format_

name: Sampling depth

content: _The name of the overarching research project during which the sample was collected. This should reflect the main initiative or study under which the sampling activity falls._
_The name of the overarching research project during which the sample was collected. This should reflect the main initiative or study under which the sampling activity falls._

name: Starting point

content: _These fields specify the exact date and time, in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), when the net throw was conducted._

_These fields specify the geographic coordinates where the net throw was conducted in decimal degrees (DD) format. Decimal degrees provide a straightforward numerical representation of the location. Click [here](http://127.0.0.1:1880/dashboard/settings) to change the format_

name: Ending point

content: _These fields specify the exact date and time, in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), when the net throw was conducted._

_These fields specify the geographic coordinates where the net throw was conducted in degrees, minutes, and seconds (DMS) format. The DMS format provides a traditional representation of geographic coordinates. Click [here](http://127.0.0.1:1880/dashboard/settings) to change the format._

name: Custom CSS
Step bar
format:
<template>
  <v-stepper model-value="1">
    <v-stepper-header>
      <v-stepper-item title="Preview" value="1"></v-stepper-item>
      <v-divider></v-divider>
      <v-stepper-item title="Sample" value="2"></v-stepper-item>
      <v-divider></v-divider>
      <v-stepper-item title="Acquisition" value="3"></v-stepper-item>
      <v-divider></v-divider>
      <v-stepper-item title="Segmentation" value="4"></v-stepper-item>
      <v-divider></v-divider>
      <v-stepper-item title="Visualisation" value="5"></v-stepper-item>
    </v-stepper-header>
  </v-stepper>
</template>
